basics.name: Damien Carli
basics.label: Junior Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Junior Full Stack Developer with a passion for building web applications. Currently in ReactJS formation to further develop my skills in a professional setting.

work.name: <Alt /> Incubateur Tech
work.summary: Participation in a collective project to create an application in agile mode.
highlights: Improved website performance by optimizing code
responsibilities: Collaborated to design and implement web applications using ReactJS and NodeJS.
Assisted in debugging and optimizing front-end code to ensure smooth user experiences.
Participated in code reviews and contributed to improving coding standards within the team.
achievements: Developing and maintaining web applications using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Collaborating with the team to implement new features and fix bugs.

work.name: DAMIEN CARLI
work.summary: Design, develop and optimize web sites or applications tailored to customer needs, while managing the technical, creative and administrative aspects of the business.
highlights: Contributed to a major project that streamlined internal workflows, improving efficiency by 30%
responsibilities: Understand customers' needs, advise them on the best solutions and ensure clear communication throughout the project.
Design, develop and deliver high-performance, secure and optimized web applications in compliance with quality standards.
Manage quotations, contracts, invoices, and ensure the planning and management of your freelance activity..
achievements: Successfully implemented a feature that enhanced user authentication, improving security measures.

work.name: CPAM De La Gironde
work.summary: Creation of an overlay for the HQBilan application with mock-ups and technical supervision.
highlights: Contributed to a major project that streamlined internal workflows, improving efficiency by 30%
responsibilities: Work closely with customers to analyze their needs, propose appropriate solutions and ensure ongoing project monitoring..
Design and develop high-performance applications, mock-ups and functional overlays for existing systems, applying best development practices.
Participate in the management of project tasks, meet deadlines, coordinate with teams and provide regular reports on development progress.
achievements: Successfully implemented a feature that enhanced user authentication, improving security measures.

work.name: Welabz
work.summary: Assisted in developing client websites and applications. Gained hands-on experience with front-end and back-end technologies.
